testcase.name: GivenPlayerSticksWithAWinningHand_WhenGamePlayed_ThenPlayerDeclaredWinner
testcase.failure:
Wanted but not invoked: view.showHouseHand(Hand{cardValues=[9, 10]}); -> at GameScreenIntegrationTest.GivenPlayerSticksWithAWinningHand_WhenGamePlayed_ThenPlayerDeclaredWinner(GameScreenIntegrationTest.java:66)
However, there were exactly 3 interactions with this mock: view.showStartingInstructions( "Press "n" to start a new blackjack game" ); -> at GamePresenter.onStartScreen(GamePresenter.java:14)
view.showHandPlayer( Hand{cardValues=[10, 11]} ); -> at GamePresenter.onStartBlackJackGame(GamePresenter.java:21)
view.showGameInstructions( "Press "s" to stick and "t" to twist" ); -> at GamePresenter.onStartBlackJackGame(GamePresenter.java:22)
